DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate long term clinical impact routine follow-up coronary angiography percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) . The primary endpoint composite death/myocardial infarction/stroke/emergency hospitalization acute coronary syndrome/hospitalization congestive heart failure 3-year percutaneous coronary intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Routine Follow-up Coronary Angiography After Percutaneous Coronary Intervention Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Routine follow-up coronary angiography percutaneous coronary intervention perform detect restenosis lot PCI center Japan . On hand , previous study report routine follow-up coronary angiography might lead unnecessary reinterventions asymptomatic patient . In situation , effect routine follow-up coronary angiography long-term clinical outcome remain unknown . The purpose study evaluate long-term clinical impact routine follow-up coronary angiography PCI compare clinical follow-up alone . The primary endpoint study composite death/myocardial infarction/stroke/emergency hospitalization acute coronary syndrome/hospitalization congestive heart failure three-year percutaneous coronary intervention . The design study almost all-comer design enrol patient receive PCI without exclusion criterion .
